definition[0]: to have a clear meaning and be easy to understand
example[0]: Read this and tell me if it makes sense.
definition[1]: to be a sensible thing to do
example[1]: It makes sense to save money while you can.
note[0]: it makes sense (for somebody) to do something
example[2]: Would it make sense for the city authorities to further restrict parking?
definition[2]: if something makes sense, there seems to be a good reason or explanation for it
example[3]: Why did she do a thing like that? It doesnâ€™t seem to make sense.
